snippet: Many of those who collectively raised more than a billion dollars to elect President Obama are also would-be diplomats, engaged in a scramble for about 30 plum embassy posts.
abstract: More than 300 top donors and bundlers who collectively raised more than a billion dollars to elect Pres Obama are now pressing to obtain one of about 30 plum embassy posts; interviews reveal complex and opaque process by which Pres Obama will make his appointments.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG

lead_paragraph: Many of those who collectively raised more than a billion dollars to elect President Obama are also would-be diplomats, engaged in a scramble for about 30 plum embassy posts.

headline.main: Well-Trod Path: Political Donor to Ambassador
headline.print_headline: Well-Trod Path: Political Donor To Ambassador
